display.value: The source responded that he or she did not know the information needed or requested.

definition.value: The source responded that he or she did not know the information needed or requested.

display.value: The source asserts that the thing in question exists, but additional information is unknown. For example, Jim knows he has a dentist, but not recall her name.

definition.value: The source asserts that the thing in question exists, but additional information is unknown. For example, Jim knows he has a dentist, but not recall her name.

display.value: Nothing of a type of thing is known to exists, e.g., the siblings of an only child. Also use this code to represent a 'none of the above' answer
